body: When running single runs there is issues with the constructions/windows that I have made. It seems like they do not update when e.g. the TVis change. Instead I tried to call it from the library, and that worked.... but... As seen on the image it writes it cannot find the glazing/window (note 1) but it exist in the library as seen from the call from library (middle left in the image). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pPSIfXxESuyTqigTgcF3juqukbyldQ9OGdBOVWXVBtD*OCnNljfFdfomiOmT-65VMWRV3P9spXR24i*wp*1AjsaMa4*2D6*e/Honeybee_EPconstruction02.JPG)
